info.title: FamilyRelocation API
info.description: API for managing Orthodox Jewish family relocation to Union County, NJ

get.summary: Gets a single activity by ID.
Gets the most recent activities across all entities.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of activities to return (default: 10, max: 50)

get.summary: Gets activities for a specific entity.

post.summary: Logs a manual activity (phone call, note, etc.) for an entity.

get.summary: Gets a paginated list of applicants with search, filter, and sort options.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default: 20, Max: 100

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description: Search term to match against name, email, or phone.

parameters.name: BoardDecision
parameters.description: Filter by board decision (Pending, Approved, Rejected, Deferred).

parameters.name: CreatedAfter
parameters.description: Filter by created date (on or after).

parameters.name: CreatedBefore
parameters.description: Filter by created date (on or before).

parameters.name: Stage
parameters.description: Filter by housing search stage (AwaitingAgreements, Searching, UnderContract, Closed, MovedIn, Paused).

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Sort field. Options: familyName, createdDate, boardReviewDate. Default: createdDate

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order. Options: asc, desc. Default: desc

post.summary:
Creates a new applicant (family) and their housing search.
Publicly accessible for board approval applications.

get.summary: Gets an applicant by ID with full details including PII.

put.summary:
Updates an existing applicant's basic information.
Cannot update: board decision, created date, applicant ID.

delete.summary:
Soft deletes an applicant.
The applicant will no longer appear in list or pipeline queries.
delete.description:
This is a soft delete - the applicant record remains in the database
with IsDeleted = true. The applicant can be restored if needed.

put.summary: Sets the board's decision on an applicant and updates status accordingly.
put.description:
Records the board's decision and automatically updates the applicant:
- Approved: Sets ApplicationStatus to Approved and creates a HousingSearch in AwaitingAgreements stage.
  Returns the new housingSearchId. Applicant can now proceed through the pipeline.
- Rejected: Sets ApplicationStatus to Rejected. No HousingSearch is created. Terminal state.
- Deferred: No status change. Applicant remains in Submitted status for future review.
- Pending: No status change. Resets decision to pending.
            
Can only set decision when applicant has Submitted status.
The 'notes' field can be used for approval notes, rejection reason, or deferral reason.

get.summary: Gets a paginated list of audit log entries with optional filters.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Filter by user who made the change.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Filter by action type (Added, Modified, Deleted).

get.summary: Gets audit history for a specific applicant.

post.summary: Authenticates a user with email and password.
Responds to an authentication challenge (e.g., NEW_PASSWORD_REQUIRED, SMS_MFA).
Refreshes access tokens using a valid refresh token.

requestBody.description: Refresh token request with username and token.

post.summary: Initiates a password reset by sending a verification code to the user's email.
Completes password reset with the verification code and new password.

requestBody.description: Email, verification code, and new password.

post.summary: Resends the email confirmation verification code.

requestBody.description: Email address to resend confirmation to.

post.summary: Confirms a user's email address with the verification code.

Admin-only: Register a new user with a temporary password.
The user will be required to change their password on first login.

requestBody.description: User registration details with optional temporary password.

get.summary: Gets the current user's roles from the database.

post.summary:
Bootstrap endpoint: Creates the first Admin user if no admins exist.
Requires a bootstrap token from configuration (Security:BootstrapToken).
Set this in user-secrets or environment variables, then remove after first admin is created.

get.summary: Gets dashboard statistics including applicant and property counts.
Gets all documents for an applicant.

post.summary: Uploads a document to cloud storage and records it in the database.
post.description:
Supported file types: PDF, JPEG, PNG
Maximum file size: 10MB
            
The documentTypeId must be a valid, active document type ID.
Use GET /api/document-types to get available document types.

delete.summary: Deletes a document from the database.
delete.description: Note: This removes the database record. The file in S3 may need separate cleanup.

get.summary: Gets a pre-signed URL for temporary access to a document.
get.description:
The URL is valid for 1 hour by default.
Use this to view or download documents stored in S3.

get.summary: Gets all document types.

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: If true (default), only return active document types.

post.summary: Creates a new document type. Admin only.

put.summary: Updates an existing document type. Admin only.

delete.summary: Deactivates (soft deletes) a document type. Admin only.

put.summary:
Changes the stage of a housing search.
Required fields depend on the target stage.
put.description:
Stage transitions and required fields:
- AwaitingAgreements -> Searching: Requires agreements to be signed (checked by document requirements)
- Searching -> UnderContract: Contract details required (price, optional propertyId and expectedClosingDate)
- Searching -> Paused: Reason optional
- UnderContract -> Closed: ClosingDate required
- UnderContract -> Searching: Contract fell through, reason optional
- Closed -> MovedIn: MovedInDate required
- Closed -> Searching: Contract fell through after closing, reason optional
- Paused -> Searching: Resume house hunting
            
Use GET /api/stage-requirements/{fromStage}/{toStage} to check required documents for transitions.

put.summary: Updates the housing preferences for a housing search.
put.description:
Housing preferences can be updated at any time during the search.
Initial preferences are copied from the applicant when the housing search is created.

get.summary: Gets a paginated list of properties with search, filter, and sort options.

post.summary: Creates a new property listing.

get.summary: Gets a property by ID.

put.description: Valid statuses: Active, UnderContract, Sold, OffMarket

post.summary: Uploads a photo for a property.
post.description: Maximum 10 photos per property. Accepted formats: JPEG, PNG.

delete.summary: Deletes a photo from a property.

put.summary: Sets a photo as the primary photo for a property.

get.summary: Gets property matches for a housing search or property.
get.description: Provide either housingSearchId or propertyId (not both).

post.summary: Creates a new property match (manual matching).

get.summary: Gets a property match by ID.

post.summary: Requests showings for one or more property matches (batch operation).

get.summary: Gets reminders with optional filtering.

post.summary: Creates a new reminder.

get.summary: Gets a reminder by ID.
Gets a due reminders report for the dashboard.
get.description:
Returns overdue reminders, reminders due today, and upcoming reminders
for the next N days (default 7).

get.summary: Gets reminders for a specific entity (applicant, housing search, etc.).

post.summary: Marks a reminder as completed.
Snoozes a reminder until a specified date.
Dismisses a reminder (soft delete).
Reopens a completed or dismissed reminder.

get.summary: Gets showings with optional filters.

post.summary: Schedules a new showing.

get.summary: Gets upcoming showings (today and future).
Gets a showing by ID.

put.summary: Reschedules a showing to a new date/time.

get.summary: Gets a paginated list of shuls with optional filtering.

post.summary: Creates a new shul.

get.summary: Gets a shul by ID.
Gets walking distances from a property to all shuls.
Gets all stage transition requirements.

post.summary: Creates a new stage transition requirement. Admin only.

get.summary: Gets document requirements for a specific stage transition.

delete.summary: Deletes a stage transition requirement. Admin only.

post.summary: Creates a new user with a temporary password.

get.summary: Lists all users with optional filtering.
Gets a specific user's details.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user's ID (email or Cognito username).

post.summary: Deactivates a user account (prevents login).
Reactivates a disabled user account.

fullAddress.description: Formatted full address: "123 Main St, Union, NJ 07083"

challengeName.description: Type of challenge being responded to.

session.description: Session token from the challenge response.

responses.description:
Challenge responses using abstracted field names:
- newPassword: For NEW_PASSWORD_REQUIRED challenge
- mfaCode: For SMS_MFA challenge
- totpCode: For SOFTWARE_TOKEN_MFA challenge
- mfaSelection: For SELECT_MFA_TYPE challenge

ChallengeRequest.description: Request to respond to an authentication challenge.

challengeName.description: Type of challenge (e.g., NEW_PASSWORD_REQUIRED, SMS_MFA, SOFTWARE_TOKEN_MFA).

session.description: Session token to use when responding to the challenge.

requiredFields.description: List of field names required to respond to this challenge.

ChallengeResponse.description: Response indicating an authentication challenge is required.

newStage.description: Target stage: AwaitingAgreements, Searching, Paused, UnderContract, Closed, MovedIn.

reason.description:
Reason for pause or contract falling through.
Required for: Paused. Optional for returning to Searching from UnderContract/Closed.

closingDate.description: Closing date. Required when transitioning to Closed.

movedInDate.description: Move-in date. Required when transitioning to MovedIn.

ChangeHousingSearchStageRequest.description: Request body for changing housing search stage.

age.description: Age of the child in years.

ChildDto.description: Information about a child in the family.

code.description: Verification code sent to the email.

ConfirmEmailRequest.description: Request to confirm a user's email address.

code.description: Verification code sent to the user's email.

ConfirmForgotPasswordRequest.description: Request to complete a password reset with verification code.

propertyId.description: Property ID (optional - for linking to Property entity).

ContractRequest.description: Contract details for putting a property under contract.

children.description: List of children in the family.

CreateApplicantCommand.description: Command to create a new applicant (family) and their housing search.

CreateReminderRequest.description: Request model for creating a reminder.

CreateStageRequirementRequest.description: Request body for creating a stage requirement.

CreateUserRequest.description: Request to create a new user.

temporaryPassword.description: Temporary password to share with the user.

DueRemindersReportDto.description: DTO for the due reminders dashboard report.

email.description: Email address of the user requesting password reset.

ForgotPasswordRequest.description: Request to initiate a password reset.

moveTimeline.description:
When the family plans to move.
Valid values: Immediate, ShortTerm, MediumTerm, LongTerm, Extended, Flexible, NotSure, Never

HousingPreferencesDto.description: DTO for housing preferences when creating an applicant.

lastName.description: Last name (family name) of the husband.

phoneNumbers.description: List of phone numbers with type and primary designation.

LogActivityRequest.description: Request body for logging a manual activity.

LoginRequest.description: Request to authenticate a user with email and password.

MatchApplicantDto.description: Minimal applicant info for match display.

MatchScoreBreakdownDto.description: Match score breakdown showing how points were calculated.

isPrimary.description: Indicates whether this is the primary contact number.

PhoneNumberDto.description: Represents a phone number with type and primary designation.

PropertyListDto.description: Lightweight property data for list views.

PropertyMatchDto.description: Full property match details including nested property and applicant info.

PropertyMatchListDto.description: Lightweight property match for list views.

username.description: The Cognito username (sub/UUID) from the tokens. Required for computing SECRET_HASH.

refreshToken.description: The refresh token from the initial login.

RefreshTokenRequest.description: Request to refresh access tokens using a refresh token.

accessToken.description: New JWT access token for API authorization.

idToken.description: New JWT ID token containing user claims.

email.description: Email address for the new user.

temporaryPassword.description: Optional temporary password. If not provided, a random one will be generated.

userId.description: Cognito user ID (sub) of the created user.

temporaryPassword.description: Temporary password to share with the new user.

RegisterUserResponse.description: Response after successfully registering a new user.

RemindersListDto.description: DTO for a paginated list of reminders.

email.description: Email address to send the confirmation code to.

ResendConfirmationRequest.description: Request to resend an email confirmation code.

ScheduleShowingRequest.description: Request to schedule a new showing.

reviewDate.description: Date of the board review. Defaults to today if not specified.

notes.description: Optional notes from the board review.

SetBoardDecisionRequest.description: Request body for setting board decision.

ShowingDto.description: Full showing details with nested property and applicant info.

anyShulAcceptable.description: Whether any shul within distance is acceptable (default: true).

SnoozeReminderRequest.description: Request model for snoozing a reminder.

phoneNumbers.description: List of phone numbers with type and primary designation.

id.description: Unique identifier of the applicant to update.

children.description: Updated list of children in the family.

Command to update an existing applicant's basic information.
Cannot update: board decision, created date, applicant ID.

UpdateDocumentTypeRequest.description: Request body for updating a document type.

moveTimeline.description: When the family plans to move.

UpdateHousingSearchPreferencesRequest.description: Request body for updating housing search preferences.

UpdatePropertyMatchStatusRequest.description: Request to update property match status.

UpdateReminderRequest.description: Request model for updating a reminder.

emailVerified.description: Whether the user's email is verified.

mfaEnabled.description: Whether MFA is enabled for this user.

createdAt.description: When the user account was created.

lastLogin.description: When the user last logged in.

UserDto.description: Represents a system user from Cognito.

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
